short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jump between GH repo and GH Pages URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I got sick of my students sending me a URL for their GitHub repo when I asked for the link to the repo's GitHub Pages site (and vice versa).

Click the extension when you're visiting a GitHub Pages site and it will open a new tab with the site's repo.

Click the extension when you're visiting a GitHub repo and it will open a new tab with the link for its GitHub Pages site (which will be 404 if GitHub Pages isn't turned on for the repo you're looking at).
